title: The Best damn fiddler from Calabogie to Kaladar
creator_credit: Peter Pearson, Barrie Howells, John Kemeny and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A story from an Upper Ottawa Valley logging community, about a man who chooses the unfettered life and uncertain income of an itinerant bush worker, even though it means that his family live poorly. The film is a study of the effects on family life of isolation and deprivation. Suitable for Upper Secondary level students.
